title: CE60116: Experimental Stress Analysis - Quick Facts

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Advanced concept of Stress and Strain, Different measures of Stress and Strain and relations between them, Application of stress and strain to various experimental problems, Photoelasticity concept and application to problems, Stress analysis of cracks in metals and non-metals and fracture mechanics concepts with application to various experimental problems
